trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the confirmation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Explicit módon indítja a megerősítő leíró tevékenység egy <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> , amely tartalmazza a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"> </xref> tevékenység.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity explicitly invokes the confirmation handler of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a célja a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>meg van adva, a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>tevékenység explicit módon hívja meg a megerősítő kezelő <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> ad vissza, amely</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity executes the default confirmation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Ha a célja a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>nincs megadva, a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>tevékenység végrehajtása az alapértelmezett megerősítést alárendelt <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>tevékenységek sikeres befejezése fordított sorrendben.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vált ki, ha a cél hivatkozik egy <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, amely korábban megerősítve, vagy kompenzálva.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság csak olvasható futásidőben.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ha a beállítás értéke futásidőben, egy <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>következik be.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.
